about_the_game:
We want to thank all those who love the Holiday Jigsaw game series, and we've made this sweet and upbeat game specially for them.

And to new players, we say: join us, and celebrate every new holiday with our Holiday Jigsaws!

The warmth of a cozy hearth, a family holiday dinner, children's laughter and cute pets. All of this awaits you in a new Holiday Jigsaw! 500 amazing and pleasant Thanksgiving Day pictures!

Enjoy high quality images, convenient controls and help, and heaps of clues and tools to help you configure the game to your liking. Special tasks and trophies make the game even more entertaining.

500 new photos means 500 ideas for a party food and decorations on Thanksgiving Day!

- 500 high quality unique images
- well designed gameplay: hints,sort tool and magnifying glass
- optional game difficulty control. Infinite gameplay!
- custom styles of pieces with rotation
- save game progress and continue the game at any time
- tasks and colorful trophies for those who love excitement
- ambient, relaxing sound
- the comfort of hearth and home in every photograph
- get 500 puzzles for one purchase. It is beneficial!

name: Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 125 MB available space

short_description: Let's celebrate Thanksgiving Day together! All the shades of autumn in 500 new photos!
